name: Treasure Guy
description:
A game made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 169.

In this game you need to solve the puzzles to open the chest and get all the treasures.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Press esc to close the game

Press F11 to enter/exit fullscreen

I didn't have all the time I wanted to work in this game, so, if you like It, let me know, I'd be very appreciated to create more levels in the future.
